name: Windows Defense
description:
Your good old Windows XP is being attacked by god knows what.
Seems like even files from MacOS are here. Build towers and make sure to protect your precious computer!

Small guide:
  • To build towers double click on build-tower.exe
  • You will be given more towers after every wave
  • To pause - click on Start icon
  • You can click on tower to see its range

Seems like now I'm teaching you how to use windows...

Submission for Mini Jam 121
Limitation: Windows as a mechanic
